(Program
  (Binary
    (Identifier)
    { (Other "==") -> (Other "<=>") }
    (Identifier))
  (Binary
    (Identifier)
    { (Other "!=") -> (Other "=~") }
    (Identifier))
  {+(Assignment
      (Identifier)
      (Unary
        (Other "!")
        (Identifier)))+}
  {-(Binary
      (Identifier)
      (Other "===")
      (Identifier))-})
